name: DragTarget
desc: A widget that receives data when a [Draggable] widget is dropped.

fields.name: builder
fields.desc: Called to build the contents of this widget.

fields.name: onWillAccept
fields.desc: Called to determine whether this widget is interested in receiving a given piece of data being dragged over this drag target.

fields.name: onWillAcceptWithDetails
fields.desc: Called to determine whether this widget is interested in receiving a given piece of data being dragged over this drag target.

fields.name: onAccept
fields.desc: Called when an acceptable piece of data was dropped over this drag target. It will not be called if `data` is `null`.

fields.name: onAcceptWithDetails
fields.desc: Called when an acceptable piece of data was dropped over this drag target. It will not be called if `data` is `null`.

fields.name: onLeave
fields.desc: Called when a given piece of data being dragged over this target leaves the target.

fields.name: onMove
fields.desc: Called when a [Draggable] moves within this [DragTarget]. It will not be called if `data` is `null`.

fields.name: hitTestBehavior
fields.desc: How to behave during hit testing.
